page.title: 18Games we play at Stebbing
page.content: We play so many games.We looked them up in Opie's book"Children's Games in Street and Playground"1969,where most are described. Our favourites,Bulldog,Chainy and Fireworks are Touch and Chase games.We play Off Ground Touch and Budge(a game of touch metal),Please Mother May I and Red Letters.We take different sizes and numbers of steps. Red Rover is a game where one team has to run through another team while they are holding hands. On the Run and 40-40 are hide and seek games. Sticky Glue is fun.When touched we stand with legs wide open until some- one goes under them to free us. Little children play Jellytots,Clock- works Begin,Duck,Duck,Duck,Goose,May We Cross The Blue Sea and Baby Mobiles.
